text: Assume that the OS is using a Strict Priority Scheduler. Thread A (priority 30) is currently holding Lock 1, and Thread B (priority 60) is waiting to acquire Lock 1. If a third thread (Thread C) is introduced to the system, which of the following priorities for Thread C will lead to priority inversion? (Assume that higher number represent higher priority) (a) 20 (b) 40 () 50 (d) 70
